data.name: CheckFolder_CheckingFolderExists
data.comment: Text indicating that soft is checking folder existence. {0} will be replaced by current folder name.

data.name: CheckFolder_SelectedFolderNotExist
data.comment: Text indicating that the selected folder has not been found

data.name: ExploreFolder_ErrorConclusion
data.comment: Text stating that exploring the folder failed

data.name: ExploreFolder_ErrorExplanationInsufficientFolders
data.value: ERREUR : Le dossier sélectionné doit contenir au moins 2 sous-dossiers représentant les collections à synchroniser
data.comment: Text explaining that the folder selected is not adequate since not enough subfolders have been found.

data.name: ExploreFolder_ErrorExplanationInsufficientPhotos
data.value: ERREUR : Le dossier sélectionné doit contenir au moins 2 sous-dossiers représentant les collections à synchroniser (i.e. avec des photos dans chaque sous-dossier)
data.comment: Text explaining that the folder selected is not adequate since not enough subfolders with photos have been found.

data.name: ExploreFolder_ExploringMainFolder
data.comment: Text indicating that soft is exploring main folder. {0} will be replaced by current folder name.

data.name: ExploreFolder_ExploringSubFolder
data.comment: Text indicating that soft is exploring a subfolder folder. {0} will be replaced by current subfolder name.

data.name: ExploreFolder_OKConclusion
data.comment: Text stating that the folder has been explored successfully

data.name: ExploreFolder_PhotoIgnored
data.value: ATTENTION : La photo '{0}' a été ignorée car elle n'avait pas de propriété DateTime ni DateTimeOriginal dans les données Exif
data.comment: Text stating that a photo will be ignored since it has no Exif properties DateTime or DateTimeOriginal included. {0} will be replaced by the photo ignored name.

data.name: ExploreFolder_PhotosCount
data.comment: Text stating the number of photos found in a given subfolders. {0} will be replaced by the number of photos found. {1} will be replaced by current subfolder name.

data.name: ExploreFolder_SubFolderCount
data.comment: Text stating the number of subfolders found. {0} will be replaced by current number of subfolders.

data.name: ExploreFolder_SubFolderIgnored
data.comment: Text stating that a subfolder will be ignored

data.name: ExploreFolder_SubSubFolderIgnored
data.value: ATTENTION : {0} sous-sous-dossiers ont été trouvés dans le sous-dossier '{1}'. Ces sous-sous-dossiers seront ignorés.
data.comment: Text stating that subsubfolder(s) has(ve) been found in a subfolder where only photos where expected. Subsubfolders will be ignored. {0} will be replaced by the number of subsubfolders found. {1} will be replaced by current subfolder name.

data.name: Generic_ButtonNext
data.comment: Next button text

data.name: Generic_ButtonPrev
data.comment: Prev button text

data.name: Generic_CorrectedDateTime
data.comment: Label for adjusted date/time

data.name: Generic_Correction
data.comment: Label for date/time correction

data.name: Generic_Day
data.comment: Label (including potential plural) for day(s)

data.name: Generic_Error
data.comment: Short label indicating an error

data.name: Generic_Hour
data.comment: Label (including potential plural) for hour(s)

data.name: Generic_Minute
data.comment: Label (including potential plural) for minute(s)

data.name: Generic_NOK
data.comment: Short label indicating that action is NOK

data.name: Generic_OK
data.comment: Short label indicating that action is OK

data.name: Generic_OriginalDateTime
data.comment: Label for original date/time

data.name: Generic_Second
data.comment: Label (including potential plural) for second(s)

data.name: Screen1_ButtonBrowse
data.comment: Browse button text

data.name: Screen1_ButtonImport
data.comment: Import button text

data.name: Screen1_Header
data.comment: Header text

data.name: Screen1_HintBrowseFolder
data.comment: Text displayed in textbox to indicate that a folder has to be selected

data.name: Screen1_LabelIncorrect
data.comment: Text displayed in case of incorrect folder choice

data.name: Screen1_MsgBoxDirectoryNotExist
data.comment: MessageBox text indicating that the directory does not exist

data.name: Screen2_Header
data.comment: Header text

data.name: Screen2_Introduction
data.value: Sélectionner un appareil photo dont la date/heure est correct ou pour lequel vous souhaitez appliquer une correction déjà connue.
data.comment: Introduction text

data.name: Screen3_ButtonPendingSync
data.comment: Text of button indicating that pending album is not syncrhonized

data.name: Screen3_Header
data.comment: Header text

data.name: Screen3_Introduction
data.value: Sélectionner un album déjà synchronisé et un album en attente. Ensuite, rechercher deux photos prises au même moment (ou ajuster manuellement la date/heure d'une photo de l'album en attente). Une fois terminé, valider la synchronisation de l'album en attente.
data.comment: Introduction text

data.name: Screen3_PendingAlbums
data.comment: Title of list of pending albums

data.name: Screen3_SyncAlbums
data.comment: Title of list of synchronized albums

data.name: Screen4_ButtonGo
data.comment: Go button text

data.name: Screen4_ButtonQuit
data.comment: Quit button text

data.name: Screen4_ColCorrection
data.comment: Header of column 'Correction'

data.name: Screen4_ColFolderName
data.comment: Header of column 'Folder Name'

data.name: Screen4_CompletedText
data.comment: Text displayed when conversion is completed. {0} is replaced by the number of photos modified.

data.name: Screen4_ConversionFailed
data.comment: Text displayed when conversion failed. {0} is replaced by the error message.

data.name: Screen4_FinalWords_Part1
data.value: Vous avez corrigé un total de {0} photos en provenance de {1} cameras.
data.comment: Final words text - part 1. {0} is replaced by the total amount of photos corrected by current user. {1} is replaced by the total amount of folders corrected.

data.name: Screen4_Header
data.comment: Header text

data.name: Screen4_Introduction
data.value: Les corrections ci-dessous vont être appliquées aux photos de chacun des dossiers
data.comment: Introduction text

data.name: Screen4_ProgressText
data.value: Corrections des date/heure des photos en cours - {0}%
data.comment: Text displayed when conversion is ongoing. {0} is replaced by the percentage of photos modified.

data.name: Screen4_FinalWords_Part2
data.value: Si vous appréciez ce logiciel, merci de nous soutenir et faites passer le mot !
data.comment: Final words text - part 2.

data.name: Screen1_CheckingFolderContent
data.value: Vérification et exploration du contenu du dossier sélectionné en cours. Merci de patienter ...
